channel.title: Manim on Preminstrel's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Manim on Preminstrel's Blog

item.title: Manim
item.description: Video rendering Command line flags 1 $ manim scene.py test -s -pql -p means preview/play, which can display the rendered video. -ql means low quality (480P15) -qm means medium quality (720P30) -qh means high quality (1080P60) DEFAULT -qp (1440P60) -qk (2160P60) -s means saving the last frame Mobjects Mobjects are the basic building block for all manim animations. For an instance, Circle, Arrow and Rectangle are mojects.
